input_args.passage: 'Mitchell, Elizabeth | Maine | “Libby” Mitchell was born in South Carolina, but her hometown is Vassalboro. She attended Furman University for her B.A.; University of North Carolina at Chapel ...'
input_args.claim: 'It also mentions that she was the Speaker of the Maine House of Representatives and as President of the Maine Senate from 2008 to 2010, becoming the first woman in the United States to have held both positions.'
